name: dolibarr
description: Dolibarr is an open-source ERP and CRM suite aimed at small and medium businesses. It includes modules for invoicing, accounting, inventory, HR, projects, and more, enabling companies to centralize operations in a self-hosted web interface.
features: Customer management: Track contacts, companies, and sales opportunities with integrated CRM tools for relationship building.
Invoicing system: Generate quotes, orders, and invoices with customizable templates and automated payment tracking.
Inventory control: Manage stock levels, warehouses, and product catalogs with barcode support and reorder alerts.
Project tracking: Plan tasks, allocate resources, and monitor project progress with time logging and milestone management.
Accounting integration: Record transactions, manage bank accounts, and generate financial reports for business oversight.
HR management: Handle employee records, leave requests, and expense reports within the unified platform.
Modular architecture: Enable only the features your business needs by activating specific modules from the extensive library.
Multi-language support: Operate in over 50 languages with localized interfaces and currency handling for global businesses.
